regen.absent_element: Situation of request for reestablishment of call when it fails in other cabs
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow a driver in any other cab to call the lead driver and request a reestablishment of the connection if the call fails.

label: If the call fails to any other cab, the driver in that cab will call the lead cab and request re-establishment of the call.
absence: situation of call failure in other cabs(not the lead traction vehicle)
